mapper.insert: insert into XT_LOGINLOG( UUID, USERNAME, LOGDATE, CLASSNAME, METHODNAME, IP, URL, CS ) values( #{UUID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USERNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOGDATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{CLASSNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{METHODNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{URL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
